greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function of composite numbers: 1 if n is composite else 0.
comment: a(n) = signum(A066246(n)), where signum = A057427. For n > 1: a(n) = 1 - A010051(n) = A005171(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
formula: a(n) = ((n+1)-(n-1)!^2) mod n, with n>=1 - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jan 29 2008
For n>1 a(n) = 1-floor(1/A001222(n)). - _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, Aug 08 2012
Dirichlet g.f.: Sum_{n>=1} a(n)/n^s = Zeta(s)-1-P(s), where P is prime zeta. - _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, Aug 08 2012
a(n) = 1 if A001222(n) > 1, 0 otherwise. - _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 20 2017
maple: P:=proc(n) local i; for i from 1 by 1 to n do print(((i+1)-(i-1)!^2) mod i); od; end: P(100); # _Paolo P. Lava_, Jan 29 2008
program: a066247 n = 1 - a010051 n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 04 2012
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 09 2001
